file.name: inputVectorFileBaseName
file.label: Vector Filename prefix
file.description: input vector file name prefix. Usually end with .txt and header file has prost fix of .txt.hdr

file.name: outputVectorFileBaseName
file.label: Output Vector Filename prefix
file.description: output vector file name prefix. Usually end with .txt and header file has prost fix of .txt.hdr

float.name: resampleProportion
float.label: resample proportion size. 1 means the same and 2 means upsample twice size, and 0.5 is downsampling in half
float.description: downsample size of 1 will be the same size as the input images, downsample size of 3 will throw 2/3 the vectors away.
